Entries.GreenFlagDude: I never received a well-thought out gift before. Thank you @!$h/253 395 340 222 223 608/Oh! This is nice. Sometimes it’s the little things that brighten up your day.$h/251 341 614 815 216 651 344/Oh, thanks. I’ll find a use for it, I’m sure//Uh, thanks... I’m not sure what to do with this, but I appreciate the gesture.//I’m sorry, but I can’t accept this. It reminds me of things I’d rather forget/-4/
If I were the rain, would I be able to connect their hearts, like how the rain connects the never-intersecting earth and sky?

Entries.GreenFlagDude0: I… I didn’t think this day would come so soon, @.$l#$b#You’ve always been my steady ground, the person who makes everything feel possible.#$b#YTo know you feel the same about me? That’s everything I could have hoped for.$l
Entries.GreenFlagDude1: $hThank you. For seeing me, for being patient, and for letting me be part of your world.#$b#I’d love nothing more than to spend my life with you.$l

Entries.6184500/f GreenFlagDude 500/t 600 1200: jaunty/6 18/farmer 9 23 0 GreenFlagDude 6 18 0/skippable/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -4 0/move farmer -4 0 3/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection farmer 1 true/faceDirection GreenFlagDude 3 true/pause 500/speak GreenFlagDude "Oh, hey @.#$b#Didn't think anyone else was awake this early.#$b#I was just brewing some coffee." /question fork0 "Want to try a cup?#I'd love to!#I'm not much of a coffee person."/fork 6184510/speak GreenFlagDude "Oh? That's okay.#$b#Maybe tea's more your thing?"/switchEvent 6184501
Entries.6184510: speak GreenFlagDude "Great! Let me pour you a cup$h#$b#Careful, it's hot.#$b#I think you'll like this blend. It's my favorite.$h"/farmerEat 395/pause 2000/emote farmer 20/emote GreenFlagDude 32/faceDirection farmer 1 true/friendship GreenFlagDude 30/switchEvent 6184501
Entries.6184501: pause 500/speak GreenFlagDude "You know... coffee isn't just a drink for me.#$b#It's something more."/speak GreenFlagDude "$sWhen life got stressful, brewing coffee calms me down. #$b#It's like... my little routine to keep me grounded.#$b#Plus, it gives me the needed energy boost to get through the day!$h"/pause 500/speak GreenFlagDude "I guess old habits stick around.$s#$b#Even in a quiet place like this.$s"/question fork1 "What should I say?#It sounds like it helped you through a lot.#Everyone needs something to keep them going."/fork 6184511/speak GreenFlagDude "You're not wrong. Coffee just happens to be mine."/switchEvent 6184502
Entries.6184511: emote GreenFlagDude 16/speak GreenFlagDude "Yeah... I guess it did. Thanks"/friendship GreenFlagDude 20/switchEvent 6184502
Entries.6184502: pause 500/speak GreenFlagDude "$hYou're alright, @.#$b#Most people wouldn't bother listening to that kind of stuff."/speak GreenFlagDude "Maybe next time, I'll try making something different.#$b#For you."/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "You spent some time talking with Levi, surrounded with the pleasant scent of morning coffee."/friendship GreenFlagDude 50/end

Entries.6184503/f GreenFlagDude 1000/t 1900 2200: echos/26 22/farmer 22 28 0 GreenFlagDude 27 22 4/skippable/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak GreenFlagDude "Oh, hey @.#$b#Didn’t expect anyone to be out this late." /move farmer 0 -4 0/move farmer 3 0 1/faceDirection GreenFlagDude 3 true/pause 2000/faceDirection GreenFlagDude 2 true/pause 500/speak GreenFlagDude "It’s nice here, isn’t it?#$b#Quiet. Peaceful."/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 500/speak GreenFlagDude "Back where I came from, nights like this weren’t really... a thing.$s#$b#Too much noise. Too many demands.$s" /faceDirection GreenFlagDude 3 true/pause 500/speak GreenFlagDude "You ever feel like no matter how much you give, it’s never enough?$s#$b#Like the more you help, the more people expect from you?$s" /faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 500/quickQuestion #Yeah, I’ve felt that way before.#I can’t imagine how hard that must’ve been.(break)speak GreenFlagDude "Really?#$b#Huh. I didn’t think many people could relate to that."(break)speak GreenFlagDude "It wasn’t easy.$s#$b#But I made it out. That’s what matters, right?"/FaceDirection GreenFlagDude 2 true/FaceDirection Farmer 2/switchEvent 6184504
Entries.6184504: pause 500/speak GreenFlagDude "I was the one holding everything together, you know?#$b#My parents, my siblings, even some distant relatives.#$b#They were perfectly capable, but they didn’t want to try. It was easier to dump everything on me.$s" /speak GreenFlagDude "I gave them everything. Money, time, energy.$a#$b#And all I got in return was more demands. More guilt trips.$a"/pause 500 /speak GreenFlagDude "Evelyn and George were the only ones who didn’t ask for anything.#$b#When they offered me a place here, it felt like... like someone had finally seen me for me." /speak GreenFlagDude "Sorry, I didn’t mean to unload all that on you.$s#$b#I guess... I just feel like I can trust you."/quickQuestion #You can always talk to me, Levi.#It’s okay. Sometimes you need to let it out.(break)speak GreenFlagDude "Thanks, @.#$b#That means a lot."(break)speak GreenFlagDude "Yeah, you’re right.#$b#Feels... lighter, somehow."/speak GreenFlagDude "Anyway, enough about that.#$b#I’ve got a good life here now. I’m not looking back." /faceDirection GreenFlagDude 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak GreenFlagDude "Thanks for listening, @.#$b#I don’t say this often, but... I’m glad we’re friends.$h"/emote farmer 60/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship GreenFlagDude 80/end
